title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.10 - Carrier's or employer's consultant not to treat employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.10 - Carrier's or employer's consultant not to treat employee

State Regulations

No podiatrist who examines for an insurance carrier or an
employer or is a podiatric consultant for the carrier or employer in the case
of an injured employee, shall subsequently participate in the podiatric care of
such injured employee. Nothing herein contained shall affect the right of
transfer by written consent of the injured employee, but the superseding
podiatrist shall comply with the provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
341.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
